titleStmt.title: An ansvver to the articles preferd against Edvvard Finch, vicar of Christ church by some of the parishioners of the same whereunto is added a just and modest reply to a most scurrilous, scandalous and malicious pamphlet, as by the title may appeare, of an uncertaine author / by Edvvard Finch...
titleStmt.author: Finch, Edward, d. 1642?

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
